name: Soakraiva
description:
Soakraiva is an adult only pixel-art 2D sci-fi action metroidvania.

You play as a woman travelling in a space ship, when the ship is attacked and infected by a giant space squid.

You must defeat various bosses to unlock abilities and cleanse areas.

Your end goal is to defeat the squid and uninfect the entire ship.

Gameplay

  • Explore the ship and find powerups to make yourself stronger
  • Use your gun to fight your way through the ship and defeat bosses to unlock abilities and uninfect areas.
  • Use your new abilities to access new areas and powerups
